title: What do I need to pay attention to when using the stainless steel mesh strap?
answer:
1.  Keep the strap level when inserting it into the clasp.

![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/733c2_aei2n.png)

2.  Ensure that the metallic protrusive part on the clasp remains within the adjustable area marked on the strap.

![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/733c3_zqqcp.png)
![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/733c4_ljwml.gif) NOTE: 

    *   Do not attempt to secure the clasp outside of the adjustable area. This may cause irreparable damage to your strap.
    *   If it feels like you need to use force to secure the clasp, adjust the strap slightly and then try again.
